title: Riot's Surveys
body:
Rito we need to talk.

Whoever you are getting to do these fucking surveys, they need to lose their job.

https://image.prntscr.com/image/2xyZIj2JT2yj9qKWAuB9yw.png

You rarely give us any options to voice our opinions, and clearly can't even take our opinions properly, because all the questions are GARBAGE.

replies.body:
Umm, that comment is actually legit.

It clearly comes from before the changes, it's now that IP is BE that the system is garbage.
